forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and thunder. Low 2C.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with a few rumbles of thunder. Lows overnight in the mid 30s.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing overnight. Low 2C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing overnight. Low 36F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 8C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 47F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 50F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain late. Increasing winds. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then becoming windy with a steady rain overnight. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. High 9C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. High 48F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 37F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
